properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 12 at 4:35AM CST until January 13 at 4:32PM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville, Tn has issued a flood advisory for
the following rivers in middle Tennessee...

Duck River At Centerville affecting Hickman County

. Heavy rainfall from yesterday has caused rises on area water waters.  Duck River
at Centerville has risen above Action Stage and is forecast to crest around 19.6 feet Monday morning.

The National Weather Service in Nashville, Tn has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Duck River At Centerville
* At 4AM Sunday the stage was 17.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* The river will rise to near 19.6 feet after midnight tomorrow.
* At 17.0 feet...Water begins to overflow the banks.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to noaa weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
